original: Forsmark, Sigfrid, revisor, Göteborg, f. 22/1/86 i Stora Tuna, Kop-parS. I., av J. F. o. Hilda Carlsson. G. 17 m. Walborg Wessman. Barn: Barbro f. 18, Sten 22. — Studiex. i Falun 04, ex. v. Gbgs hand :inst. 05. Anst. i A-B Dalarnes Bank 05, i Gbgs Hand:bank 06, bitr. dir. v. dess huv:-kont. 19-26, grund, egen rev:- o. för-valtn:byrå i Gbg 26. Led. av Sv. rev:-samf. sed. 28, sekr. i dess lokalavd. f. v. Sv:e sed. 33, av hand :kamm. godkänd granskn :man 32, led. av styr. f. Dala gille sed. 22. Medl. av Frimurarorden.
translated: Forsmark, Sigfrid, auditor, Gothenburg, b. 22/1/86 in Stora Tuna, Kopparberg County, son of J.F. and Hilda Carlsson. Married 17 with Walborg Wessman. Children: Barbro b. 18, Sten b. 22. - Completed studies in Falun in 1904, graduated from Gothenburg School of Business in 1905. Employed at AB Dalarnes Bank in 1905 and at Gothenburg's Handelsbank in 1906. Assistant director of the main office of Handelsbanken from 1919-1926. Founded his own audit and management firm in Gothenburg in 1926. Member of the Swedish Association of Auditors since 1928, secretary of its local branch for West Sweden since 1933, approved auditor by the Chamber of Commerce in 1932, member of the board for Dala Gille since 1922. Member of the Freemason Order.

structured.name: Sigfrid Forsmark
structured.description: Approved auditor by the Chamber of Commerce in 1932, member of the board for Dala Gille since 1922, and secretary of the local branch of Swedish Association of Auditors for West Sweden since 1933.
